entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 6:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: NE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or periods of rain changing to periods of rain this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia early in the evening. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
